Changelog
---------

0.2.0 (2014-02-26)
++++++++++++++++++

* Bottle support.
* Add ``targets`` param to ``Parser``. Allows setting default targets.
* Add ``files`` target.

0.1.0 (2014-02-16)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release.
* Parses JSON, querystring, forms, headers, and cookies.
* Support for Flask and Django.
